verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for he is <S%H2896>good:<s%> for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Let the <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> so, <S%H834>whom<s%> he has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>enemy;<s%>
And <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of the <S%H776>lands,<s%> from the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and from the <S%H3220>south.<s%>
They <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in a <S%H3452>solitary<s%> <S%H1870>way;<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H4186>dwell<s%> in.
<S%H7456>Hungry<s%> and <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H5848>fainted<s%> in them.
Then they <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
And he <S%H1869>led<s%> them forth by the <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they might <S%H3212>go<s%> to a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H4186>habitation.<s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For he <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> the <S%H8264>longing<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H4390>fills<s%> the <S%H7456>hungry<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2896>goodness.<s%>
Such as <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and in the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> being <S%H615>bound<s%> in <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and <S%H1270>iron;<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H5006>contemned<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>High:<s%>
Therefore he <S%H3665>brought<s%> <S%H3665>down<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> with <S%H5999>labor;<s%> they <S%H3782>fell<s%> <S%H3782>down,<s%> and there was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5826>help.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3467>saved<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death,<s%> and <S%H5423>broke<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> in sunder.
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
For he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> in sunder.
<S%H191>Fools<s%> <S%H1870>because<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> and because of their <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> are <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>
Their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8581>abhors<s%> all manner of <S%H400>meat;<s%> and they draw <S%H5060>near<s%> to the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
Then they <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3467>saves<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H7495>healed<s%> them, and <S%H4422>delivered<s%> them from their <S%H7825>destructions.<s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
And let them <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H5608>declare<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> with <S%H7440>rejoicing.<s%>
They that <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> in <S%H591>ships,<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>
<S%H1992>These<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H6381>wonders<s%> in the <S%H4688>deep.<s%>
For he <S%H559>commands,<s%> and <S%H5975>raises<s%> the <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> which <S%H7311>lifts<s%> up the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof.

They <S%H5927>mount<s%> up to the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> again to the <S%H8415>depths:<s%> their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4127>melted<s%> because of <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>
They <S%H2287>reel<s%> to and fro, and <S%H5128>stagger<s%> like a <S%H7910>drunken<s%> man, and are at their <S%H2451>wit's<s%> <S%H1104>end.<s%>
Then they <S%H6817>cry<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in their <S%H6862>trouble,<s%> and he <S%H3318>brings<s%> them out of their <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
He makes the <S%H5591>storm<s%> a <S%H1827>calm,<s%> so that the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof are <S%H2814>still.<s%>
Then are they <S%H8056>glad<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they be <S%H8367>quiet;<s%> so he <S%H5148>brings<s%> them to their <S%H2656>desired<s%> <S%H4231>haven.<s%>
Oh that men would <S%H3034>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for his <S%H2617>goodness,<s%> and for his <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>
Let them <S%H7311>exalt<s%> him also in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> him in the <S%H4186>assembly<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> into a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H4161>springs<s%> <S%H4325><s%> into <S%H6774>dry<s%> ground;
A <S%H6529>fruitful<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> into <S%H4420>barrenness,<s%> for the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
He <S%H7760>turns<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> into a <S%H98>standing<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H127>ground<s%> into <S%H4161>springs.<s%> <S%H4325><s%>
And <S%H8033>there<s%> he makes the <S%H7456>hungry<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell,<s%> that they may <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H4186>habitation;<s%>
And <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> which may <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6529>fruits<s%> of <S%H8393>increase.<s%>
He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> them also, so that they are <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and suffers not their <S%H929>cattle<s%> to <S%H4591>decrease.<s%>
Again, they are <S%H4591>diminished<s%> and <S%H7817>brought<s%> <S%H7817>low<s%> through <S%H6115>oppression,<s%> <S%H7451>affliction,<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow.<s%>
He <S%H8210>pours<s%> <S%H937>contempt<s%> on <S%H5081>princes,<s%> and causes them to <S%H8582>wander<s%> in the <S%H8414>wilderness,<s%> where there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Yet sets he the <S%H34>poor<s%> on <S%H7682>high<s%> from <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and <S%H7760>makes<s%> him <S%H4940>families<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
The <S%H3477>righteous<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> and all <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> shall <S%H7092>stop<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H4310>Whoever<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and will <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, even they shall <S%H995>understand<s%> the loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
